articles.title: Manchester United ace Lisandro Martinez did something for Argentina that Nemanja Vidic would love - Manchester Evening News
articles.description: Man United's Lisandro Martinez was superb for Argentina during their World Cup win over Mexico over the weekend
articles.content:
Manchester United defender Lisandro Martinez is living up to Nemanja Vidic's high expectations as a centre-back by giving "150 per cent" in every tackle the Argentinian makes.
